original_text: Since they had been without food for a long time, Paul stood up among them and said, “Men, you should have listened to me and not have set sail from Crete and incurred this injury and loss.
korean_text: 여러 사람이 오래 먹지 못하였으매 바울이 가운데 서서 말하되 여러분이여 내 말을 듣고 그레데에서 떠나지 아니하여 이 타격과 손상을 면하였더라면 좋을 뻔하였느니라

sentences.original_text: Since they had been without food for a long time
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 오랫동안 음식 없이 지냈기 때문에

sentences.original_text: Men, you should have listened to me
and not have set sail from Crete
and incurred this injury and loss
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 상해와 손실을 초래하지 말았어야 했습니다
